summary: The diff implements nearly all requirements: language modal (REQ-1), hero section with school name and location (REQ-2), classes section with 5 class cards (REQ-3), contact form with backend persistence (REQ-4), warm earthy visual theme (REQ-5), and logo/banner images from the correct path (REQ-6). Minor gaps exist around the success state button not being translated. Overall implementation is solid and complete.

missing_requirements.requirement: All user-facing strings on the page change based on the selected language
missing_requirements.reason: In ContactForm.tsx, the 'Send Another Message' button after successful submission is hardcoded in English and does not use the translation system, violating the requirement that all user-facing strings change based on selected language.

hallucinated_features.description: An 'About' section with Mission and Vision cards was added to the site
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not include any requirement for an About section with mission/vision content. This is extra functionality not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration including InternetIdentityProvider, useInternetIdentity hook, and AuthClient
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states 'No student login or authentication system' as a non-goal, yet the implementation includes full Internet Identity auth infrastructure.

hallucinated_features.description: deleteContactInquiry, getAllContactInquiries, and getContactInquiry backend functions exposed publicly
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only requires storing contact inquiries in the backend canister. Admin dashboard and content management are explicitly listed as non-goals. Exposing query and delete functions for all inquiries goes beyond the spec.
